title: Quick spicy quesadillas
time: Hands on time 10 mins, plus 6 mins cooking time
description: A great vegetarian recipe that even die-hard meat eaters will love. You could easily increase the quantities and serve this tasty Mexican treat at a party.
ingredients: 1 tbsp ready-diced red chilli or 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
1 orange or yellow pepper, finely diced
A small handful of fresh coriander leaves, roughly chopped

method.Step 1: In a bowl, mix the beans with the red chilli, pepper, coriander leaves and spring onions. Season and spread evenly over 2 soft flour tortillas. Top each with a handful of grated Cheddar and sandwich a second tortilla on top.

method.Step 2: Heat a large non-stick pan, lightly greased with olive oil, over a medium-high heat. Carefully fry each quesadilla, 1 at a time, for about 1Â½ minutes each side, until they are golden and the filling is hot (invert onto a plate to turn them over).

method.Step 3: Cut into wedges and serve with fresh guacamole, for dipping.
